channel.title: {Webclient}[PI]Connection Error...Retrying in 3...2....1.....5...[PI]{Webclient}
channel.description:
Ok, I tried this on my friend's computer that did not have the cache on it. My client is webclient ready and I jarred it and everything, but when I run the client, it will download the cache successfully, but then it will say "Connection Error...Retrying in 3...2....1.......................5...".
It IS in the c:/ file.
This is the tutorial I used to make my webclient:
http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/253018-how-make-your-project-insanity-client-webclient.html
replace "google" with "R une-server"
Will resort to money reward if helped successfully.

Ok, I tried this on my friend’s computer that did not have the cache on it.
My client is webclient ready and I jarred it and everything, but when I run the client, it will download the cache successfully, but then it will say “Connection Error…Retrying in 3…2…1…5…”.
